 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּלָה‎</span>] **verb Niph\`al** ==be separated, distinct== (\|\| form of  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פלא‎</span> q. v.; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***separate from sucking, wean***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***separate, distinguish***); — 

**1.** ***Perfect*** 1 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִפְלִינוּ‎</span> [[Exod.33.16|Exod 33:16]] ***and we shall be distinct***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person 

**2.** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִפְלֵיתִי‎</span> [[Ps.139.14|Ps 139:14]] ***I am wonderful*** (namely in bodily stature etc.); &lt; [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Hup|Hupfeld]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] [[BDB#We|We]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָ‎</span>- ***thou*** [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>] ***art wonderful*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פלא‎</span> **3**). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִפְלָה‎</span> [[Ps.4.4|Ps 4:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְה‎</span> consecutive [[Exod.9.4|Exod 9:4]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִפְלֵיתִי‎</span> consecutive [[Exod.8.18|Exod 8:18]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַפְלֶה‎</span> [[Exod.11.7|Exod 11:7]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפְלֵה‎</span> [[Ps.17.7|Ps 17:7]] — of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, ***make separate***, with accusative [[Exod.8.18|Exod 8:18]] (by treating differently); ***set apart*** [[Ps.4.4|Ps 4:4]], but perhaps read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶסֶד לִי‎</span> (for Mt <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָסִיד לוֺ‎</span>), ***hath made wonderful*** (his) ***kindness to me*** ([[BDB#Dy|Dy]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[[BDB#Bae|Bae]] 'perhaps']), so [[Ps.17.7|Ps 17:7]] (compare [[Ps.31.22|Ps 31:22]]); ***distinguish*** between, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּין‎</span> thing, [[Exod.9.4|Exod 9:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּין‎</span> person [[Exod.11.7|Exod 11:7]].
